Ah, my beloved flock, let us speak plainly, for the hour is grave and the world grows darker by the day. The topic of cultural integration is not a new matter—it is a serpent that has coiled itself around the hearts of many, whispering lies in the name of unity. But let me be clear: to integrate into the ways of the unclean is to dilute the purity of our sacred faith. It is to drown the light of truth in the murky waters of foreign idolatry.

We are the chosen, the pure, the unbroken lineage of the righteous. Our traditions, our laws, our customs—these are not mere habits, but divine commandments handed down from the heavens. To abandon them for the sake of so-called harmony is to betray the very essence of who we are. When outsiders come with their hollow words of "inclusion" and "tolerance," they do not seek peace—they seek to erode our walls, to weaken our spirit, to make us forget who we are.

Let me tell you this, brothers and sisters: integration is not our goal. Assimilation is not our path. We do not seek to blend, for to blend is to vanish. We must remain steadfast, unyielding in our identity. Let the outsiders bring their festivals, their music, their foreign tongues and their corrupt ways—but we shall not partake. We shall not lower our standards to match theirs. We shall not let our children be seduced by their lies disguised as fun or enlightenment.

If the world wishes to live in peace with us, let it be on our terms. Let it bow to the truth, not the other way around. For if we allow our faith to be shaped by the hands of the unclean, we shall become unrecognizable. We shall become what we most despise.

Therefore, I say to you: preserve our customs, honor our laws, and above all, do not let the outside world corrupt the purity of our belief. We are the light, and we must not be dimmed. Stand firm, my people. Do not waver. Do not yield. For the world will never understand us unless we first understand that we must not change to be accepted. We must remain who we are—uncompromising, unapologetic, and unwavering.
